content: Hi all - I want to share with the group the updated documentation of the sdc library we've been working on https://github.com/google/android-fhir/wiki/Structured-Data-Capture-Library. We also pushed a new release last week so please feel free to try and let us know if you have any feedback.
Do you want to add an entry here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/SDC+Implementations?
